macrodef.name: git_checkout
macrodef.description: Execute an svn export. The export will be execute from the named tag. If the tag does not exist in the repository one will be create on the HEAD revision before execution (you will be ask if you want to create the tag). If you enter 'HEAD' for tag, the export will be executed from the HEAD revision and no tag will be created. If attribute 'branch' is use all action are performed on the named branch instead of trunk.

attribute.name: tag
attribute.description: Tag from which the export will be executed.

attribute.name: root
attribute.description: Root of the svn repository. Default is ${svn.root}

attribute.name: project
attribute.description: A folder within the svn repository representing the project to check out. Default is ${svn.project}

attribute.name: branch
attribute.description: If this attribute is used, the check out will be executed on named branch.

input.message: Enter GIT-Tag for checkout. If tag not exists one will be created on head revision. Enter HEAD to checkout head revision without creating a tag.

macrodef.name: git_checkoutHEAD
macrodef.description: Execute git export from the HEAD revision of trunk (if attribute branch is not used) or of the branch indicated by attribute branch.

attribute.name: root
attribute.description: Root of the svn repository. Default is ${svn.root}

attribute.name: project
attribute.description: A folder within the svn repository representing the project to check out. Default is ${svn.project}

attribute.name: branch
attribute.description: If this attribute is used, the head of the named branch will checked out.

echo.message: Checked out HEAD revision of trunk in repository @{root} to destination @{destdir}.
Checked out HEAD revision of tag @{branch} in repository @{root} to destination @{destdir}.

macrodef.name: git_checkoutTag
macrodef.description: Execute svn export from named tag.

attribute.name: tag
attribute.description: Tag from which the export will be executed.

attribute.name: root
attribute.description: Root of the svn repository. Default is ${svn.root}

attribute.name: project
attribute.description: A folder within the svn repository representing the project to check out. Default is ${svn.project}

macrodef.name: git_createTag
macrodef.description: Create a git tag on head of trunk (if attribute branch is not used) or of the branch indicated by attribute branch. There will be no checks if the tag already exists!

attribute.name: root
attribute.description: Root of the svn repository. Default is ${svn.root}

attribute.name: branch
attribute.description: If this attribute is used, the tag will be create on the named branch.

echo.message: Created tag @{tag} on head of trunk in repository @{root}
Created tag @{tag} on head of branch @{branch} in repository @{root}

macrodef.name: git_removeTag
macrodef.description: Remove a tag from git. There will be no check if the tag already exists!

attribute.name: root
attribute.description: Root of the svn repository. Default is ${svn.root}

macrodef.name: git_update
macrodef.description: Execute an git update on current location.
